Functions

 Initialize the AES object using key.
 
void aes_exit (aes_t *aes)
 Destroy the AES object (clear key in memory.
 
int aes_encrypt (aes_t *aes, void *data, ssize_t nbytes)
 Encrypt the data block pointed to by data.
